content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius regional district court the court made a final resolution regarding the division of matrimonial property between the defendant and the applicant the movable property including cars tools furniture and cash was awarded to both parties the defendant has been ordered to pay compensation to the applicant for a greater share of the matrimonial property the text also mentions various articles from the civil code that are relevant to the case the applicant is seeking the dissolution of their marriage division of matrimonial property and other requests in court the defendant has filed a counterclaim seeking the dissolution of the marriage and other requests the court will determine the value of the matrimonial property consider evidence provided by both parties and make a decision on the division of property the court may also consider the interests of any minor children and the financial situation of the parties the court has partially accepted the counterclaim and will dissolve the marriage the court awards various personal properties to the applicant and the defendant and orders the defendant to pay compensation to the applicant the court dismisses the remainder of the counterclaim and orders the applicant to pay the defendants costs of proceedings
